mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM bb_system_record_statis WHERE date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{createTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT id,menua as menu,COUNT(menua) as amount,createTime FROM bb_system_record_${yyyyMMdd} group by menua union all SELECT id,menub as menu,COUNT(menub) as amount,createTime FROM bb_system_record_${yyyyMMdd} group by menub union all SELECT id,menuc as menu,COUNT(menuc) as amount,createTime FROM bb_system_record_${yyyyMMdd} group by menuc

select.foreach:
SELECT id,menu,sum(amount) as amount,createTime FROM bb_system_record_statis where menu = CONCAT('点击',#{name})
and date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by menu
